downloadTitle: Microsoft System Center 2012 R2 Operations Manager Management Pack to configure Operations Management Suite
downloadDescription: Microsoft System Center 2012 R2 Operations Manager Management Pack for configuring new connections or reconfiguring existing connections to Operations Management Suite
detailsSection:
Overview:

For configuring new connections to Operations Management Suite with Microsoft System Center 2012 R2 Operations Manager, you need to import the management packs available in this download. If you have already confirgured connection to OMS with SC 2012 R2 OM then you do not need to import this management pack, however if you reconfigure your exisitng connection then you need to import this management pack. This management pack uses the new APIs to configure connections to Operations Management Suite. Feature Summary
This Management Pack bundle contains one Management packs:
  • Microsoft.SystemCenter.Advisor.mpb
  • Microsoft.SystemCenter.Advisor.Internal.mpb
systemRequirementsSection: Microsoft System Center 2012 R2 Operations Manager
installInstructionSection: To configure new connections or reconfigure your exisitng connections to Operations Management Suite with Microsoft System Center 2012 R2 Operations Manager, import "Microsoft.SystemCenter.Advisor.mpb" management pack available in this download.
